source.query:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="account">
    <attribute name="msdyn_partyid" />
    <attribute name="name" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" />
    <attribute name="accountnumber" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_vendorcreatedbyworkflowname" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_mappedvendoraccount" />
    <attribute name="accountid" />
    <link-entity name="msdyn_party" from="msdyn_partyid" to="msdyn_partyid" link-type="inner">
      <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" alias="PartyNumber" />
    </link-entity>
    <link-entity name="cdm_company" from="cdm_companyid" to="msdyn_company" link-type="outer">
      <attribute name="cdm_companycode" alias="CompanyCode" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="contact" >
    <attribute name="msdyn_partyid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" />
    <attribute name="contactid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_contactforvendor" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_contactfor" />
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_sellable" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_linkedvendoraccount" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_isvendor" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_contactpersonid" />
    <link-entity name="cdm_company" from="cdm_companyid" to="msdyn_company" link-type="outer" >
      <attribute name="cdm_companycode" alias="CompanyCode" />
    </link-entity>
    <link-entity name="msdyn_party" from="msdyn_partyid" to="msdyn_partyid" link-type="inner" >
      <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" alias="PartyNumber" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="msdyn_vendor" >
    <attribute name="msdyn_vendorpartynumber" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_lastname" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_partyid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_vendoraccountnumber" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_name" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_vendorid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_firstname" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addressstreetnumber" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addressdistrictname" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addressstreet" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addresscountryregionisocode" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addresspostbox" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_linkedvendorincontactsentity" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_linkedvendorinaccountsentity" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addressstateid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addresscity" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addresscountyid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addresscountryregionid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_addresszipcode" />
    <link-entity name="cdm_company" from="cdm_companyid" to="msdyn_company" link-type="inner" >
      <attribute name="cdm_companycode" alias="CompanyCode" />
    </link-entity>
    <link-entity name="msdyn_party" from="msdyn_partyid" to="msdyn_partyid" >
      <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" alias="PartyNumber" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

activities.name: 1-2-Retrieve party postal address from FO
activities.description: Retrieve party postal address from FO

source.query:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="customeraddress" >
    <attribute name="stateorprovince" />
    <attribute name="addressnumber" />
    <attribute name="line1" />
    <attribute name="line2" />
    <attribute name="line3" />
    <attribute name="county" />
    <attribute name="country" />
    <attribute name="addresstypecode" />
    <attribute name="postalcode" />
    <attribute name="city" />
    <attribute name="name" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_isprimaryname" />
    <attribute name="customeraddressid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_locationid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_isprimary" />
    <attribute name="parentid" />
    <attribute name="latitude" />
    <attribute name="longitude" />
    <link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="parentid" link-type="inner" >
      <attribute name="msdyn_partyid" />
      <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" />
      <link-entity name="msdyn_party" from="msdyn_partyid" to="msdyn_partyid" link-type="inner" >
        <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" alias="PartyNumber" />
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="customeraddress" >
    <attribute name="stateorprovince" />
    <attribute name="addressnumber" />
    <attribute name="line1" />
    <attribute name="line2" />
    <attribute name="line3" />
    <attribute name="county" />
    <attribute name="country" />
    <attribute name="addresstypecode" />
    <attribute name="postalcode" />
    <attribute name="city" />
    <attribute name="name" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_isprimaryname" />
    <attribute name="customeraddressid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_locationid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_isprimary" />
    <attribute name="parentid" />
    <attribute name="latitude" />
    <attribute name="longitude" />
    <link-entity name="contact" from="contactid" to="parentid" link-type="inner" >
      <attribute name="msdyn_partyid" />
      <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" />
      <link-entity name="msdyn_party" from="msdyn_partyid" to="msdyn_partyid" link-type="inner" >
        <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" alias="PartyNumber" />
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="msdyn_postaladdresscollection" >
    <attribute name="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_location" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_description" />
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="msdyn_party" >
    <attribute name="msdyn_partyid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" />
  </entity>
</fetch>

source.query:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="msdyn_postaladdresscollection" >
    <attribute name="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_location" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_description" />
  </entity>
</fetch>

activities.name: 1-12-Retrieve Party postal address from Dataverse
activities.description: Retrieve Party postal address from Dataverse

source.query:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="msdyn_partypostaladdress">
    <attribute name="msdyn_partypostaladdressid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" />
    <order attribute="msdyn_name" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="msdyn_party" from="msdyn_partyid" to="msdyn_partyid" link-type="inner" alias="pt">
      <attribute name="msdyn_partynumber" />
    </link-entity>
    <link-entity name="msdyn_postaladdresscollection" from="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" to="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" link-type="inner" alias="pac">
      <attribute name="msdyn_location" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="msdyn_postaladdress">
    <attribute name="msdyn_postaladdressid" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="msdyn_validfrom" />
    <order attribute="msdyn_name" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="msdyn_postaladdresscollection" from="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" to="msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid" visible="false" link-type="outer" alias="pac">
      <attribute name="msdyn_location" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

properties.description: CRM Linked service to connect CRM environment

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		line1 as string,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean,
		{account1.msdyn_partyid} as string,
		{account1.msdyn_partynumber} as string,
		county as string,
		addressnumber as short,
		customeraddressid as string,
		msdyn_locationid as string,
		city as string,
		objecttypecode as string,
		postalcode as string,
		stateorprovince as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string,
		parentid as string,
		name as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		country as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSAccountAddress
source(output(
		{contact1.msdyn_partynumber} as string,
		customeraddressid as string,
		{contact1.msdyn_partyid} as string,
		addressnumber as short,
		addresstypecode as short,
		objecttypecode as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		parentid as string,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean,
		line1 as string,
		county as string,
		msdyn_locationid as string,
		latitude as string,
		city as string,
		postalcode as string,
		longitude as string,
		stateorprovince as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string,
		name as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSContactAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_addresscity as string,
		msdyn_addressstateid as string,
		msdyn_addresszipcode as string,
		msdyn_addresscountyid as string,
		msdyn_firstname as string,
		msdyn_lastname as string,
		CompanyCode as string,
		msdyn_addressstreet as string,
		msdyn_addresscountryregionid as string,
		msdyn_vendorpartynumber as string,
		msdyn_partyid as string,
		msdyn_vendoraccountnumber as string,
		msdyn_vendorid as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		msdyn_name as string,
		msdyn_linkedvendorinaccountsentity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSVendorAddress
source(output(
		CountryRegion as string,
		ISOcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOCountryISOCode
AccountAddressSortByAddressNumber aggregate(groupBy(line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		name),
	addressnumber = min(addressnumber),
		customeraddressid = first(customeraddressid)) ~> RemoveDuplicateAccountAddress
CDSAccountAddress sort(asc(parentid, true),
	asc(addressnumber, true)) ~> AccountAddressSortByAddressNumber
CDSContactAddress sort(asc(parentid, true),
	asc(addressnumber, true)) ~> ContactAddressSortByAddressNumber
ContactAddressSortByAddressNumber aggregate(groupBy(line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		name),
	addressnumber = min(addressnumber),
		customeraddressid = first(customeraddressid)) ~> RemoveDuplicateContacttAddress
DistinctAccountAddress, DistinctContactAddress union(byName: true)~> AccountContactAddress
AccountContactAddress, VendorAddressAttribute union(byName: true)~> AccountContactVendorAddress
CDSVendorAddress select(mapColumn(
		stateorprovince = msdyn_addressstateid,
		country = msdyn_addresscountryregionid,
		msdyn_vendorpartynumber,
		msdyn_partyid,
		PartyNumber,
		line1 = msdyn_addressstreet,
		postalcode = msdyn_addresszipcode,
		city = msdyn_addresscity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VendorAddressAttribute
AccountContactVendorAddress, FOCountryISOCode join(lower(country) == lower(CountryRegion),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CountryRegionCode
CountryRegionCode derive(CounrtyRegionISOCode = iifNull(ISOcode, country, ISOcode)) ~> CounrtyRegionISOCode
CounrtyRegionISOCode select(mapColumn(
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		msdyn_vendorpartynumber,
		msdyn_partyid,
		country = CounrtyRegionISOCode,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DistinctCEAddress
RemoveDuplicateContacttAddress select(mapColumn(
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DistinctContactAddress
RemoveDuplicateAccountAddress select(mapColumn(
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		longitude,
		latitude,
		name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DistinctAccountAddress
DistinctCEAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CEAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConsolidateAccountAddress
AccountContactAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CDSAccountContactAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CDSAccountContactAddress

source(output(
		msdyn_location as string,
		msdyn_validfrom as timestamp,
		msdyn_name as string,
		msdyn_zipcode as string,
		msdyn_postbox as string,
		msdyn_district as string,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment as string,
		msdyn_countryregionid as string,
		msdyn_validto as timestamp,
		msdyn_county as string,
		msdyn_city as string,
		msdyn_street as string,
		msdyn_state as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Longitude as string,
		line1 as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string,
		msdyn_postaladdressid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CEPostalAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames as string,
		msdyn_islocationowner as boolean,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CEPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		msdyn_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOCEPostalAddressCollection
source(output(
		msdyn_partyid as string,
		msdyn_partynumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSParty
DistinctPostalAddress, FOCEPostalAddressCollection join(lower(DistinctPostalAddress@msdyn_location) == lower(FOCEPostalAddressCollection@msdyn_location),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PostalAddressCollection
PostalAddressLocationOwnerParty select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location = DistinctPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
		msdyn_validfrom,
		msdyn_name,
		msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid,
		msdyn_validto,
		msdyn_county,
		msdyn_city,
		msdyn_street,
		msdyn_state,
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_islocationowner,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		msdyn_postaladdressid,
		Latitude,
		Longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PostalAddressCollectionId
ExpiredPostalAddressUnion, CDSParty join(lower(ExpiredPostalAddressUnion@msdyn_partynumber) == lower(CDSParty@msdyn_partynumber)
	&& msdyn_islocationowner == true(),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'both')~> PostalAddressPartyAssociation
CEPostalAddress filter(msdyn_validto > currentUTC()) ~> ActivePostalAddress
CEPostalAddress filter(msdyn_validto <= currentUTC()) ~> ExpiredPostalAddress
CEPartyPostalAddress filter(msdyn_islocationowner) ~> CEPartyPostalAddressLocationOwner
CEPartyPostalAddressLocationOwner select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_partynumber,
		msdyn_location,
		msdyn_islocationowner,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CEPartyPostalAddressLocationOwnerParty
ActivePostalAddress aggregate(groupBy(msdyn_location,
		msdyn_validfrom,
		msdyn_name,
		msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid,
		msdyn_validto,
		msdyn_county,
		msdyn_city,
		msdyn_street,
		msdyn_state,
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		msdyn_postaladdressid,
		Latitude,
		Longitude),
	first = first(msdyn_location)) ~> DistinctPostalAddress
PostalAddressCollection, CEPartyPostalAddressLocationOwnerParty lookup(lower(DistinctPostalAddress@msdyn_location) == lower(CEPartyPostalAddressLocationOwnerParty@msdyn_location),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(msdyn_partynumber, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PostalAddressLocationOwnerParty
PostalAddressCollectionId, ExpiredPostalAddress union(byName: true)~> ExpiredPostalAddressUnion
PostalAddressPartyAssociation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FOCEPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		msdyn_location,
		msdyn_name,
		msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid,
		msdyn_county,
		msdyn_city,
		msdyn_street,
		msdyn_state,
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_islocationowner,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		msdyn_partyid,
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		msdyn_validto,
		msdyn_validfrom,
		msdyn_postaladdressid,
		msdyn_latitude = Latitude,
		msdyn_longitude = Longitude
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FOCEPostalAddress

properties.description: Convert FO new address files into csv format to import through DIXF

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		LocationId as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FONewPostalAddressLocation
source(output(
		PartyNumber as string,
		LocationId as string,
		IsPrimary as boolean,
		IsLocationOwner as boolean,
		Purpose as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FONewPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		Street as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CountryRegionISOCode as string,
		LocationId as string,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		PostBox as string,
		DistrictName as string,
		BuildingCompliment as string,
		County as string,
		Description as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FONewPostalAddress
FONewPartyPostalAddress derive(IsPrimary = case(IsPrimary,1,0),
		IsLocationOwner = case(IsLocationOwner,1,0)) ~> EnumValue
FONewPostalAddressLocation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ImportFONewPostalAddressLocation.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FONewPostalAddressLocationImport
EnumValue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ImportFONewPartyPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FONewPartyPostalAddressImport
FONewPostalAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ImportFONewPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FONewPostalAddressImport

source(output(
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames as string,
		msdyn_islocationowner as boolean,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean,
		msdyn_partypostaladdressid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CEPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		msdyn_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOCEPostalAddressCollection
source(output(
		msdyn_partyid as string,
		msdyn_partynumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSParty
CEPartyPostalAddress, FOCEPostalAddressCollection join(lower(CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_location) == lower(FOCEPostalAddressCollection@msdyn_location),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PartyPostalAddressCollection
PartyPostalAddressCollection, CDSParty join(CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_partynumber == CDSParty@msdyn_partynumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PartyPostalAddressPartyId
PartyPostalAddressPartyId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FOCEPartyPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FOCEPartyPostalAddress

source(output(
		line1 as string,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean,
		{account1.msdyn_partyid} as string,
		{account1.msdyn_partynumber} as string,
		county as string,
		addressnumber as short,
		customeraddressid as string,
		msdyn_locationid as string,
		city as string,
		objecttypecode as string,
		postalcode as string,
		stateorprovince as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string,
		parentid as string,
		name as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSAccountAddress
source(output(
		{contact1.msdyn_partynumber} as string,
		line1 as string,
		postalcode as string,
		{contact1.msdyn_partyid} as string,
		city as string,
		country as string,
		msdyn_locationid as string,
		customeraddressid as string,
		objecttypecode as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		parentid as string,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean,
		county as string,
		addressnumber as short,
		stateorprovince as string,
		addresstypecode as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSContactAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_location as string,
		msdyn_validfrom as string,
		msdyn_name as string,
		msdyn_zipcode as string,
		msdyn_postbox as string,
		msdyn_district as string,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment as string,
		msdyn_countryregionid as string,
		msdyn_validto as string,
		msdyn_county as string,
		msdyn_city as string,
		msdyn_street as string,
		msdyn_state as string,
		line1 as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CEPostalAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames as string,
		msdyn_islocationowner as boolean,
		msdyn_isprimary as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CEPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		line1 as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string,
		city as string,
		stateorprovince as string,
		postalcode as string,
		country as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		parentid as string,
		addressnumber as short,
		customeraddressid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSAccountContactAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		msdyn_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOCEPostalAddressCollection
source(output(
		accountid as string,
		CompanyCode as string,
		accountnumber as string,
		name as string,
		msdyn_partyid as string,
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		PartyNumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSAccount
source(output(
		msdyn_sellable as boolean,
		fullname as string,
		contactid as string,
		msdyn_contactpersonid as string,
		msdyn_partyid as string,
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		msdyn_contactforvendor as boolean,
		PartyNumber as string,
		CompanyCode as string,
		msdyn_isvendor as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSContact
TargetAccountType, TargetContactType union(byName: true)~> CDSAccountContact
CEPostalAddress, CEPartyPostalAddress join(lower(CEPostalAddress@msdyn_location) == lower(CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_location),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOAddress
CDSAccountContact, CustomerAddressMatch exists(lower(CDSAccountContact@parentid) == lower(CustomerAddressMatch@parentid)
	&& lower(CDSAccountContact@customeraddressid) == lower(CustomerAddressMatch@customeraddressid)
	&& lower(CDSAccountContact@PartyNumber) == lower(CustomerAddressMatch@PartyNumber),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerAddressNotExists
RemoveMissingPartyNumber derive(line1 = "",
		line2 = "",
		line3 = "",
		city = "",
		stateorprovince = "",
		county = "",
		country = "",
		postalcode = "",
		msdyn_locationid = "") ~> BlankCustomerAddressAttribute
FOAddress, CDSAccountContactAddress join(lower(iifNull(CEPostalAddress@line1,"",CEPostalAddress@line1)) == lower(iifNull(CDSAccountContactAddress@line1,"",CDSAccountContactAddress@line1))
	&& lower(iifNull(msdyn_city,"",msdyn_city)) == lower(iifNull(city,"",city))
	&& lower(iifNull(msdyn_zipcode,"",msdyn_zipcode)) == lower(iifNull(postalcode,"",postalcode))
	&& lower(iifNull(msdyn_countryregionid,"",msdyn_countryregionid)) == lower(iifNull(country,"",country))
	&& lower(iifNull(msdyn_state,"",msdyn_state)) == lower(iifNull(stateorprovince,"",stateorprovince))
	&& lower(msdyn_partynumber) == lower(PartyNumber),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerAddressLocation
CustomerAddressParentType select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location = CEPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
		line1 = CEPostalAddress@line1,
		line2 = CEPostalAddress@line2,
		line3 = CEPostalAddress@line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		msdyn_partynumber = CDSAccountContactAddress@PartyNumber,
		parentid = CDSAccountContactAddress@parentid,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		name = msdyn_name,
		TargetParentId,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		county = msdyn_county,
		msdyn_building = msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_postbox
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerAddressLocationUpdate
FOAddress, CustomerAddressMatch exists(lower(iifNull(CEPostalAddress@msdyn_location, "", CEPostalAddress@msdyn_location)) == lower(iifNull(CustomerAddressMatch@msdyn_location, "", CustomerAddressMatch@msdyn_location))
	&& lower(CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_partynumber) == lower(PartyNumber),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOAddressNotExistsCE
FOAddressNotExistsCE, CDSAccountContactAddress exists(lower(msdyn_partynumber) == lower(PartyNumber),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOAddressNotExistsCEForCA
FOAddressNotExistsCEForCA filter(greater(toDate(msdyn_validto),toDate(currentUTC()))) ~> ActiveAddress
MergeAccountContactParentId select(mapColumn(
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		TargetParentId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerAddressPartyParent
ActiveAddress, CustomerAddressPartyParent join(lower(msdyn_partynumber) == lower(PartyNumber),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOActiveAddressWithParentId
CDSAccountContactAddress aggregate(groupBy(PartyNumber,
		parentid),
	count = count()) ~> DistinctPartyNumber
DistinctAddress select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location,
		name = msdyn_name,
		postalcode = msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_building = msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		country = msdyn_countryregionid,
		county = msdyn_county,
		city = msdyn_city,
		stateorprovince = msdyn_state,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		parentid,
		TargetParentId,
		line1,
		line2,
		line3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FOActiveCustomerAddressFields
FOActiveAddressWithParentId aggregate(groupBy(msdyn_validfrom,
		CEPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
		msdyn_name,
		msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid,
		msdyn_validto,
		msdyn_county,
		msdyn_city,
		msdyn_street,
		msdyn_state,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_islocationowner,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		TargetParentId,
		line1,
		line2,
		line3),
	count = count()) ~> DistinctAddress
CustomerAddressLocationUpdate, FONewActiveCustomerAddress union(byName: true)~> FOActiveCustomerAddressMerge
FOActiveCustomerAddressMerge, CECustomerAddressUpdateFields union(byName: true)~> BlankCustomerAddressUnion
PostalAddressCollectionId aggregate(groupBy(line1,
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid,
		line2,
		line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		parentid,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_building,
		msdyn_postbox,
		TargetParentId,
		BlankCustomerAddressUnion@msdyn_location,
		name,
		msdyn_district),
	count = count()) ~> UniqueCustomerAddress
FOActiveCustomerAddressFields window(over(msdyn_partynumber),
	asc(msdyn_partynumber, true),
	num = rowNumber()) ~> FOPartyNumberSequence
BlankCustomerAddressAttribute window(over(PartyNumber),
	asc(PartyNumber, true),
	asc(addressnumber, true),
	num = rowNumber()) ~> CEPartyNumberSequence
CEPartyNumberSequence, FOPartyNumberSequence join(lower(CDSAccountContact@parentid) == lower(FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@parentid)
	&& CEPartyNumberSequence@num == FOPartyNumberSequence@num
	&& lower(PartyNumber) == lower(msdyn_partynumber),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerAddressUpdate
CustomerAddressUpdate select(mapColumn(
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		objecttypecode,
		addresstypecode,
		msdyn_location,
		name = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@name,
		postalcode = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@postalcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_building,
		country = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@country,
		county = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@county,
		city = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@city,
		line1 = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@line1,
		stateorprovince = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@stateorprovince,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_isprimary = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@msdyn_isprimary,
		parentid = CDSAccountContact@parentid,
		num = FOPartyNumberSequence@num,
		TargetParentId = CDSAccountContact@TargetParentId,
		line2 = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@line2,
		line3 = FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@line3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CECustomerAddressUpdateFields
FOPartyNumberSequence, CECustomerAddressUpdateFields exists(lower(FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@msdyn_partynumber) == lower(CECustomerAddressUpdateFields@msdyn_partynumber)
	&& lower(FOActiveCustomerAddressFields@parentid) == lower(CECustomerAddressUpdateFields@parentid)
	&& FOPartyNumberSequence@num == CECustomerAddressUpdateFields@num,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FONewActiveCustomerAddress
BlankCustomerAddressUnion, FOCEPostalAddressCollection join(lower(BlankCustomerAddressUnion@msdyn_location) == lower(FOCEPostalAddressCollection@msdyn_location),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PostalAddressCollectionId
DistinctPartyNumber, CDSAccount join(lower(parentid) == lower(accountid),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AccountType
DistinctPartyNumber, CDSContact join(lower(parentid) == lower(contactid),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ContactType
ContactType derive(TargetParentId = "contact") ~> ContactParentId
AccountType derive(TargetParentId = "account") ~> AccountParentID
AccountParentTarget, ContactParentTarget union(byName: true)~> MergeAccountContactParentId
ContactParentId select(mapColumn(
		PartyNumber = DistinctPartyNumber@PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		count,
		msdyn_sellable,
		fullname,
		contactid,
		msdyn_contactpersonid,
		msdyn_partyid,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		msdyn_contactforvendor,
		CompanyCode,
		msdyn_isvendor,
		TargetParentId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ContactParentTarget
AccountParentID select(mapColumn(
		PartyNumber = DistinctPartyNumber@PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		count,
		accountid,
		CompanyCode,
		accountnumber,
		name,
		msdyn_partyid,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		TargetParentId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AccountParentTarget
CDSAccountAddress derive(TargetParentId = "account") ~> TargetAccountType
CDSContactAddress derive(TargetParentId = "contact") ~> TargetContactType
CustomerAddressLocation, CustomerAddressPartyParent join(lower(CDSAccountContactAddress@PartyNumber) == lower(CustomerAddressPartyParent@PartyNumber)
	&& lower(CDSAccountContactAddress@parentid) == lower(CustomerAddressPartyParent@parentid),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerAddressParentType
CustomerAddressNotExists filter(PartyNumber!="") ~> RemoveMissingPartyNumber
UniqueCustomerAddress sort(asc(msdyn_partynumber, true),
	asc(customeraddressid, true)) ~> Sort1
CustomerAddressLocation select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location = CEPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
		msdyn_validfrom,
		msdyn_name,
		msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid,
		msdyn_validto,
		msdyn_county,
		msdyn_city,
		msdyn_street,
		msdyn_state,
		line1 = CEPostalAddress@line1,
		line2 = CEPostalAddress@line2,
		line3 = CEPostalAddress@line3,
		msdyn_partynumber,
		msdyn_location = CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_islocationowner,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		line1 = CDSAccountContactAddress@line1,
		line2 = CDSAccountContactAddress@line2,
		line3 = CDSAccountContactAddress@line3,
		city,
		stateorprovince,
		postalcode,
		country,
		PartyNumber,
		parentid,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerAddressMatch
Sort1 filter((country!="" && msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid!="")) ~> RemoveBlankAddress
RemoveBlankAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CustomerAddress

source(output(
		LocationId as string,
		ValidFrom as string,
		Street as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Description as string,
		ValidTo as string,
		County as string,
		DistrictName as string,
		Longitude as string,
		City as string,
		StreetNumber as string,
		CountryRegionId as string,
		State as string,
		PostBox as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		BuildingCompliment as string,
		CountryRegionISOCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOPostalAddress
source(output(

		ParentLocationId as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOPostalAddressLocation
source(output(
		PartyNumber as string,
		LocationId as string,
		Purpose as string,
		IsLocationOwner as boolean,
		IsPrimary as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		Street as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CountryRegionISOCode as string,
		LocationId as string,
		ValidFrom as string,
		ValidTo as string,
		PostBox as string,
		DistrictName as string,
		BuildingCompliment as string,
		County as string,
		Description as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FONewPostalAddress
source(output(
		LocationId as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FONewPostalAddressLocation
source(output(
		PartyNumber as string,
		LocationId as string,
		IsPrimary as boolean,
		IsLocationOwner as boolean,
		Purpose as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FONewPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		LocationId as string,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PostBox as string,
		DistrictName as string,
		BuildingCompliment as string,
		CountryRegionISOCode as string,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		County as string,
		City as string,
		Street as string,
		State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOPostalAddressUpdate
source(output(
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid as string,
		msdyn_location as string,
		msdyn_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSPostalAddressCollection
source(output(
		msdyn_partypostaladdressid as string,
		msdyn_name as string,
		createdon as string,
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid as string,
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		msdyn_location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSPartyPostalAddress
source(output(
		msdyn_postaladdressid as string,
		createdon as string,
		msdyn_validfrom as string,
		{pac.msdyn_location} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDSPostalAddress
FOPostalAddressUpdateExists, FONewPostalAddressLatitueLongitude union(byName: true)~> FOCEPostalAddress
FOPostalAddressLocation, FONewPostalAddressLocation union(byName: true)~> FOCEPostalAddressLocation
FOPartyPostalAddress, FONewPartyPostalAddress union(byName: true)~> FOCEPartyPostalAddress
FOCEPostalAddressLocation select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location = LocationId,
		msdyn_description = Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CEPostalAddressColection
FOCEPartyPostalAddress select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_partynumber = PartyNumber,
		msdyn_location = LocationId,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames = Purpose,
		msdyn_islocationowner = IsLocationOwner,
		msdyn_isprimary = IsPrimary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CEPartyPostalAddress
FOCEPostalAddress select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location = LocationId,
		msdyn_validfrom = ValidFrom,
		msdyn_name = Description,
		msdyn_zipcode = ZipCode,
		msdyn_postbox = PostBox,
		msdyn_district = DistrictName,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment = BuildingCompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid = CountryRegionISOCode,
		msdyn_validto = ValidTo,
		msdyn_county = County,
		msdyn_city = City,
		msdyn_street = Street,
		msdyn_state = State,
		Latitude,
		Longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CEPostalAddress
CEPostalAddress derive(line1 = split(msdyn_street,"\n")[1],
		line2 = split(msdyn_street,"\n")[2],
		line3 = split(msdyn_street,"\n")[3],
		msdyn_postaladdressid = "") ~> SplitStreet
FOPostalAddress, FOPostalAddressUpdate exists(lower(FOPostalAddress@LocationId) == lower(FOPostalAddressUpdate@LocationId),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOPostalAddressUpdateExists
FONewPostalAddress select(mapColumn(
		Street,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CountryRegionISOCode,
		LocationId,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		PostBox,
		DistrictName,
		BuildingCompliment,
		County,
		Description,
		Latitude = latitude,
		Longitude = longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FONewPostalAddressLatitueLongitude
CEPostalAddressColection, CDSPostalAddressCollection join(CEPostalAddressColection@msdyn_location == CDSPostalAddressCollection@msdyn_location,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOCEPostalAddressCollectionJoin
FOCEPostalAddressCollectionJoin select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location = CEPostalAddressColection@msdyn_location,
		msdyn_description = CEPostalAddressColection@msdyn_description,
		msdyn_postaladdresscollectionid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FOCEPostalAddressCollectionFields
CEPartyPostalAddress, CDSPartyPostalAddress join(CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_partynumber == CDSPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_partynumber
	&& CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_location == CDSPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> POCEPartyPostalAddressJoin
POCEPartyPostalAddressJoin select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_partynumber = CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_partynumber,
		msdyn_location = CEPartyPostalAddress@msdyn_location,
		mdyn_postaladdresspurposenames,
		msdyn_islocationowner,
		msdyn_isprimary,
		msdyn_partypostaladdressid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PartyPostalAddressFileds
SplitStreet, CDSPostalAddress join(msdyn_location == {pac.msdyn_location}
	&& toUTC(toTimestamp( CEPostalAddress@msdyn_validfrom),'UTC') == toUTC(toTimestamp(CDSPostalAddress@msdyn_validfrom),'UTC'),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOCEPostalAddressJoin
FOCEPostalAddressJoin select(mapColumn(
		msdyn_location,
		msdyn_validfrom = CEPostalAddress@msdyn_validfrom,
		msdyn_name,
		msdyn_zipcode,
		msdyn_postbox,
		msdyn_district,
		msdyn_buildingcompliment,
		msdyn_countryregionid,
		msdyn_validto,
		msdyn_county,
		msdyn_city,
		msdyn_street,
		msdyn_state,
		Latitude,
		Longitude,
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		msdyn_postaladdressid = CDSPostalAddress@msdyn_postaladdressid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FOCEPostalAddressFields
FOCEPostalAddressFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CEPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CEPostalAddressFile
FOCEPostalAddressCollectionFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CEPostalAddressCollection.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CEPostalAddressCollectionFile
PartyPostalAddressFileds sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CEPartyPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CEPartyPostalAddressFile

parameters{
	prefix as string ("ADF-")
}
source(output(
		LocationId as string,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		Description as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PostBox as string,
		DistrictName as string,
		BuildingCompliment as string,
		CountryRegionISOCode as string,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		County as string,
		City as string,
		Street as string,
		State as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		Purpose as string,
		IsLocationOwner as boolean,
		IsPrimary as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOAddress
source(output(
		line1 as string,
		line2 as string,
		line3 as string,
		city as string,
		stateorprovince as string,
		postalcode as string,
		PartyNumber as string,
		parentid as string,
		addressnumber as short,
		customeraddressid as string,
		msdyn_vendorpartynumber as string,
		msdyn_partyid as string,
		country as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CEAddress
CEAddressExists filter((line2!="" || line3!="")) ~> CEStreetAddressUpdate
FOAddress, CEAddress join(lower(iifNull(Street,"",Street)) == lower(iifNull(line1,"",line1))
	&& lower(iifNull(FOAddress@City,"",FOAddress@City)) == lower(iifNull(CEAddress@city, "",CEAddress@city))
	&& lower(iifNull(State,"",State)) == lower(iifNull(stateorprovince,"",stateorprovince))
	&& lower(iifNull(ZipCode,"",ZipCode)) == lower(iifNull(postalcode,"",postalcode))
	&& lower(iifNull(CountryRegionISOCode, "", CountryRegionISOCode)) == lower(iifNull(country,"",country))
	&& lower(FOAddress@PartyNumber) == lower(CEAddress@PartyNumber),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CEAddressExists
CEStreetAddressUpdate derive(Street = concatWS("\n",line1, line2,line3)) ~> ConcatenateStreetAddress
FilterBlankCEAddress, FOAddress exists(lower(iifNull(line1,"",line1)) == lower(iifNull(Street,"",Street))
	&& lower(iifNull(CEAddress@city,"",CEAddress@city)) == lower(iifNull(FOAddress@City,"",FOAddress@City))
	&& lower(iifNull(stateorprovince,"",stateorprovince)) == lower(iifNull(State,"",State))
	&& lower(iifNull(postalcode,"",postalcode)) == lower(iifNull(ZipCode,"",ZipCode))
	&& lower(iifNull(country, "", country)) == lower(iifNull(CountryRegionISOCode,"",CountryRegionISOCode))
	&& lower(CEAddress@PartyNumber) == lower(FOAddress@PartyNumber),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FOAddressNotExists
FOAddressNotExists filter((line1!="" || line2!="" || line3!="" || stateorprovince!= "" ||city!=""||country!="") && (PartyNumber!="")) ~> FilterBlankAddress
FilterBlankAddress keyGenerate(output(LocationId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> ADFLocationId
ADFLocationId derive(Description = iifNull(name,"ADFAddress",name),
		LocationId = concat($prefix, toString(LocationId)),
		IsPrimary = "False",
		IsLocationOwner = "True",
		Purpose = case(addressnumber==1,'Delivery',
case(addressnumber==2,'Invoice'
)),
		Street = concatWS("\n",line1, line2,line3),
		ValidFrom = currentUTC(),
		ValidTo = toUTC(toTimestamp("2154-12-31 23:59:59"),'UTC')) ~> PostalAddressDescription
ConcatenateStreetAddress select(mapColumn(
		LocationId,
		ValidFrom,
		Description,
		ZipCode,
		PostBox,
		DistrictName,
		BuildingCompliment,
		CountryRegionISOCode,
		ValidTo,
		County,
		City = FOAddress@City,
		Street,
		State,
		latitude,
		longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FOPostalAddressUpdateFields
CEToFOAttributes, FOPostalAddressUpdateFields union(byName: true)~> FoPostalAddressUpdateMerge
CEAddress filter((line1!="" || line2!="" || line3!="" || stateorprovince!= "" ||city!=""||country!="") && (PartyNumber!="")) ~> FilterBlankCEAddress
PostalAddressDescription select(mapColumn(
		line1,
		line2,
		line3,
		City = city,
		State = stateorprovince,
		ZipCode = postalcode,
		CountryRegionISOCode = country,
		PartyNumber,
		addressnumber,
		customeraddressid,
		msdyn_vendorpartynumber,
		msdyn_partyid,
		LocationId,
		Description,
		IsPrimary,
		IsLocationOwner,
		Purpose,
		Street,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		latitude,
		longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CEToFOAttributes
PostalAddressDescription sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FONewPartyPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		PartyNumber,
		LocationId,
		IsPrimary,
		IsLocationOwner,
		Purpose
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FONewPartyPostalAddress
PostalAddressDescription sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FONewPostalAddressLocation.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		LocationId,
		Description
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FONewPostalAddressLocation
FoPostalAddressUpdateMerge sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FONewPostalAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Street,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CountryRegionISOCode,
		LocationId,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		PostBox,
		DistrictName,
		BuildingCompliment,
		County,
		Description,
		latitude,
		longitude
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FONewPostalAddress
FOPostalAddressUpdateFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FOPostalAddressUpdate.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FOPostalAddressUpdate

source(output(
		LocationId as string,
		ValidFrom as string,
		Description as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PostBox as string,
		DistrictName as string,
		BuildingCompliment as string,
		CountryRegionISOCode as string,
		ValidTo as string,
		County as string,
		City as string,
		Street as string,
		State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOPostalAdrress
source(output(
		PartyNumber as string,
		LocationId as string,
		Purpose as string,
		IsLocationOwner as boolean,
		IsPrimary as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FOPartyPostalAddress
FOPostalAdrress, FOPartyPostalAddress join(lower(FOPostalAdrress@LocationId) == lower(FOPartyPostalAddress@LocationId),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PostalAddressDenormalize
PostalAddressDenormalize sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FOAddress.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartyPostalAddressDenormalize
